## MarketplaceContractDeployMetadata interface

Options for deploying a Marketplace contract

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface MarketplaceContractDeployMetadata 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |

|  [description?](./sdk.marketplacecontractdeploymetadata.description.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Optional description of the contract |
